songs.title: Consequences
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Livin' in the moment
Livin' for a thrill
Just to satisfy yourself
Looking for a kill
When you fuck me over
I never say a word
Am I the voice of reason?
'Cos I am never heard

[Chorus]
Nothin' lasts forever
Nothin's ever free
Soon the flame will burn out, and you'll
See what you could have been

[Verse 2]
Now and then I see you
You're not standing tall
I see your face and I know you
Anticipate the fall
Running scared from your life
You're running out of time
Face the consequences now
Is it all in your mind?

[Chorus]
Nothin' lasts forever
Nothin's ever free
Soon the flame will burn out, and you'll
See what you could have been

[Verse 3]
Livin' in the moment
Livin' for the thrill
Just to satisfy yourself
Looking for a kill
Running scared from your life
You're running out of time
Face the consequences now
Is it all in your mind?

[Chorus]
Nothin' lasts forever
Nothin's ever free
Soon the flame will burn out, and you'll
See what you could have been
